articles.content: Shares of HDFC Bank Ltd. gained as much as 4% to hit a record high of 1,794 per share on the NSE on Wednesday (July 3) after its US-listed shares rallied nearly 4% in the overnight trade.On the chart… [+2574 chars]

articles.title: Indian startups show sign of recovery with $7 Bn funding in H1 2024 - Entrackr
articles.description: As per data compiled by TheKredible, Indian startups managed to raise nearly $7 billion in funding during H1 2024.

articles.title: Bajaj's CNG bike officially teased; launch in two days - BikeWale
articles.description: Bajaj has finally released a teaser video of its most awaited CNG motorcycle which is currently rumoured to be called the Bruzer. The official launch of this bike will take place in two days on 5 July.
